title: Fyodor Shcherbachenko
text:
Fyodor Anatolyevich Shcherbachenko (; born 13 August 1962) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player and referee.
Career.
Playing.
As a player, he made his debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Second%20League">Soviet Second League</a> in 1981 for <a href="FC%20Tsement%20Novorossiysk">FC Tsement Novorossiysk</a>.
Referee.
From 1995 to 1998, he worked as a referee, mostly in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a> and lower levels.
Managerial.
Following <a href="Dmitriy%20Ogai">Dmitriy Ogai</a> resignation in July 2015, Shcherbachenko was appointed as manager of <a href="FC%20Kaisar">FC Kaisar</a> on 6 August 2015. Shcherbachenko left the club on 10 November following the completion of the <a href="2015%20Kazakhstan%20Premier%20League">2015 season</a> during which Kaisar were relegated.
